divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother had called me to tell me to look outside to the NW. I went outside and saw a bright light in the sky. I knew it was not a star due to the shape, the black in the center and the blinking red and blue lights at the tips. first looked like a sphere but was a triangle. lights at 2 bottom tips. It was swaying back and forth from left to right slowly. Wasn't going anywhere so it wasn't a plane. My sister in Kansas also witnessed this from her home. Neighbors, and friends also saw this object. as the sky got darker, it got dimmer. So that rules out a star and a plane. Fighter jets were flying towards it and around it. was reported to media channels KTIV channel 4 and KCAU channel 9 in Sioux city but nothing was reported. Had no sound what so ever. I believe it is a UFO (coincides with other sightings everyday this month from all over the world. from Australia to Ireland, from Canada to Peru. we are not alone.
trends: There has been one other sighting in South Sioux City
There were no other sightings in South Sioux City on or around September 25th 2013
Summary: sphere/triangle shape stationary blinking red/blue lights, black center lightly swinging back and forth
